about_the_game:
In this intriguing story, players will take on the role of John, a man who is deeply concerned about his twin brother's sudden and inexplicable disappearance. Determined to uncover the truth behind this mysterious event, John embarks on a perilous journey into the unknown. Along the way, he discovers an ancient and ominous book that seems to hold the key to unlocking the secrets of his brother's disappearance. As he delves deeper into its pages, John finds himself transported to a nightmarish realm where danger lurks around every corner. With each turn of the page, John must face new challenges and overcome increasingly difficult obstacles in order to find his missing twin and bring him back to safety. Will he succeed in his quest? Only time will tell in this spine-tingling tale of suspense and intrigue.

Features


The story: Dive into the chapters of different worlds and beings while in pursuit of your brothers disappearance and whereabouts.

Exploration: Experience a world unknown to most, with varying terrain and locations on your journey.

Puzzles: Work with various items to unlock secrets and hidden truths to find your way around

Note: some of the listed features will appear only in the full The Collection experience.

name: The Collection: Chapters of Fate Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 (2.7 GHz 4 Core) / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X (3.5 GHz 4 Core) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (req. 6GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX 580 (req. 6GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 (3.7 GHz 6 Core) / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X (3.7 GHz 8 Core) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 Super (req. 6GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT (req. 6GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A First person, Short story indie horror game with an immersive atmosphere.
